secText:
Lesson:
1. Show how to compute the volume of a cylinder. (lesson 1.11)
2. Show how to compute the volume of pyramids and cones. (all are same lesson).
3. Show how toto compute the volume of a sphere.

In-class assessment:
1. Have students compute the volume of a pyramid with base of 10 square meters and height of 30 meters. Then have them compute the volume of a sphere of radius 4 meters.
